title: Watch me at 3pm - Kirazeness - Diamond Stream
body: Finally got the time to stream. Feel free to stop by for a peek. Just a heads up for my regulars, the new tank meta has really affected my signature Champs so I will have to change my play style. Hope I won't disappoint you guys :)

replies.body: the game has been a tank meta for like 3 years

> [{quoted}](name=WEETBIX 4 BREKKI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fM7Xioiw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-19T01:54:43.215+0000)
>
> the game has been a tank meta for like 3 years

Really now because this is my first time having issues melting tanks. I shouldn't bother asking because  all you do is spread hate on this community. The person who needs to get a life is you. Cleary you need something better to do. Animals get restless when they are bored you know? Go get yourself a new chew toy.

> [{quoted}](name=WEETBIX 4 BREKKI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fM7Xioiw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-19T02:54:08.898+0000)
>
> Sorry it took you 2 years to work out the meta :-) I forgot the human brain differs from person to person.

Sorry but I don't intend to entertain your kind. I regret even acknowledging your existance. And before I go, just like to tell you that I wasn't even the least mad at your statement on the meta. I'm mad at your "contribution" to the league board. Just look at your profile and tell me how great it is.

> [{quoted}](name=Kiraze,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fM7Xioiw,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-19T03:07:41.462+0000)
>
> Sorry but I don't intend to entertain your kind. I regret even acknowledging your existance. And before I go, just like to tell you that I wasn't even the least mad at your statement on the meta. I'm mad at your "contribution" to the league board. Just look at your profile and tell me how great it is.

I'm not even serious in 99% of them, It's not my issue if people cannot distinguish jokes on the internet. Also when I look at my history I laff knowing how many people like you are unable to loosen up and realise getting told to git gud on the internet won't effect your life, the amount of people who cry internally when I bring their gaming ego into question is more amusing than league itself.

Also explain how the 'tank meta' effects your playstyle? how could it possibly be such an impact you need to play differently, you're diamond not in the LCS mate.

> [{quoted}](name=WEETBIX 4 BREKKI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fM7Xioiw,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-19T03:26:19.426+0000)
>
> I'm not even serious in 99% of them, It's not my issue if people cannot distinguish jokes on the internet. Also when I look at my history I laff knowing how many people like you are unable to loosen up and realise getting told to git gud on the internet won't effect your life, the amount of people who cry internally when I bring their gaming ego into question is more amusing than league itself.
> 
> Also explain how the 'tank meta' effects your playstyle? how could it possibly be such an impact you need to play differently, you're diamond not in the LCS mate.

Lol... impressed at how you're still going. Do I sound serious to you? What if all this was a joke to make you mad.

Edit: Also consider getting into diamond again before talking shit here (totally a joke) because there's absolutely no point boasting about your past rank. And if you say it isn't hard (because it really isn't) then get it. 

I call it tank meta because on average, 3/5 champions in one team are going tank. Top/Jg/Support. You don't see a nuking jarvan or master yi jungle as often anymore. Top bans? Nautilus, Sejuani, Gragas. And like I said, I've never had issues melting tanks. Now I have to melt 3.

> [{quoted}](name=Kiraze,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fM7Xioiw,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-19T22:57:31.706+0000)
>
> Lol... impressed at how you're still going. Do I sound serious to you? What if all this was a joke to make you mad.
> 
> Edit: Also consider getting into diamond again before talking shit here (totally a joke) because there's absolutely no point boasting about your past rank. And if you say it isn't hard (because it really isn't) then get it. 
> 
> I call it tank meta because on average, 3/5 champions in one team are going tank. Top/Jg/Support. You don't see a nuking jarvan or master yi jungle as often anymore. Top bans? Nautilus, Sejuani, Gragas. And like I said, I've never had issues melting tanks. Now I have to melt 3.

My alt is on an 8 win streak and going to be diamond soon, this game isn't hard, feel free to duo with me some time, I'm easily one of the better support players on oce hands down :-) I have gone against many master/challengers even duo challengers and won, the only difference between diamond and master/challenger on oce is very little (with exclusion to a few top tier challengers, reydere etc.) and before you say 'why don't you get it' I do plan on getting challenger this year.

edit: as I said before, the tank meta isn't a new thing, remember when shyvana destroyed top? remember when mundo destroyed top? remember when maokai destroyed top? remember when j4 jungle was insane? remember when soraka got nerfed better of the insane tank combo at a tournament last year that I cannot remember the name of which consisted of raka/mundo and some other few irritating champs to make a team comp that struggled to die and stalled out games for easy wins and raka could just keep up the tanks indefinitely. Don't pretend that this is a new meta, I've been playing on and off for 4 years, tanks have always been very powerful especially with the edition of s3 talent tree.

It has been statistically proven a team with 2-3 tanks have a much higher win rate, which is why I feel playing a tank support has always been invaluable to a team.

http://i.imgur.com/C2TXX8G.png

> [{quoted}](name=WEETBIX 4 BREKKI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fM7Xioiw,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-20T01:20:48.467+0000)
>
> My alt is on an 8 win streak and going to be diamond soon, this game isn't hard, feel free to duo with me some time, I'm easily one of the better support players on oce hands down :-) I have gone against many master/challengers even duo challengers and won, the only difference between diamond and master/challenger on oce is very little (with exclusion to a few top tier challengers, reydere etc.) and before you say 'why don't you get it' I do plan on getting challenger this year.
> 
> edit: as I said before, the tank meta isn't a new thing, remember when shyvana destroyed top? remember when mundo destroyed top? remember when maokai destroyed top? remember when j4 jungle was insane? remember when soraka got nerfed better of the insane tank combo at a tournament last year that I cannot remember the name of which consisted of raka/mundo and some other few irritating champs to make a team comp that struggled to die and stalled out games for easy wins and raka could just keep up the tanks indefinitely. Don't pretend that this is a new meta, I've been playing on and off for 4 years, tanks have always been very powerful especially with the edition of s3 talent tree.
> 
> It has been statistically proven a team with 2-3 tanks have a much higher win rate, which is why I feel playing a tank support has always been invaluable to a team.
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/C2TXX8G.png

I don't need evidence about how good you are plus I never asked. Your personality stinks and that's all we're saying. I've gone against countless of challengers, like all humans they make mistakes.
well I can see you reported what I wrote, which in terms means in victory for me, stay upset kid, remember to not contact the police when someone says a mean word to you :-D
